    Single_data_input

    Single_data_input.Rd

    Input the Single data in seruat format

    Single_data_input(
  Pagwas,
  Single_data,
  nfeatures = NULL,
  FilterSingleCell = FALSE,
  Pathway_list = NULL,
  min.lib.size = 1000,
  min.reads = 10,
  min.detected = 5,
  min_clustercells = 50
)

    Arguments

    Pagwas

    Pagwas format

    Single_data

    Input the Single data in seruat format, Idents should be the celltypes annotation.

    nfeatures

    The parameter for FindVariableFeatures, NULL means select all genes

    FilterSingleCell

    whther to filter the single cell data,if you filter it before,choose FALSE, otherwise set TRUE.

    Pathway_list

    (list,character) pathway gene sets list

    min.lib.size

    Threshold for single data library.

    min.reads

    Threshold for total reads fo each cells.

    min.detected

    Threshold for total cells fo each gene.

    min_clustercells

    Threshold for total cells fo each cluster.

    Value

    Pagwas

    Examples

    library(scPagwas)
data(scRNAexample)
# Pagwas is better getting from GWAS_summary_input(),or NULL is right,
Pagwas <- Single_data_input(Pagwas = Pagwas, Single_data = scRNAexample)
#> Input single cell count data and cell annotation data!
#> Error in Single_data_input(Pagwas = Pagwas, Single_data = scRNAexample): object 'Pagwas' not found
